text: Hianagi tagra tamagerfa huta mikazama hugahunema huta huvempama hu'nona nanekere otineta, monafi kuini a'mofonte mananentake zantamima kre mnavu ofa nehuta, waini tinema tagitreta ofa hugahune. Tagehe'za e'inahu avu'ava hu'nazankita tagrane, kini vahetimo'zane, kva vahetimo'zanena Judama me'nea kumatamimpine, Jerusalemi kumapima me'nea ne'onse kantamimpinena ofa hu'none. Ana hu'nonanagi ana knafina ne'zankura atupara osuta knare huta nemanita, hazenkea e'ori'none.
